amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 147 the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 117-2, modified by the amendment printed in part A of the report of the Committee on Rules is considered as adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
